segments.text: It tastes great , but it is really dry . Is your fish all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder if they left it sitting around too long before they served it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's exactly what I was thinking had happened .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The vegetables are kind of mushy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So are mine . I think they left them cooking too long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The food here is usually good , so I think that we should tell the waiter that there is a problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that you are right . Maybe they can give us a free dessert or something .
segments.speaker: S2
